attributes.action: give an additional one months driving ban to the current law if you are caught using a mobile phone whilst driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that people that use a mobile phone whilst driving feel that it is still acceptable to do so & do not think what they are doing is that bad.so i would like to see a short sharp shock approach & see a one months driving ban introduced for this blatant disregard for the current law.
